answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some resources you might find useful as a start.
This article describes different models of talent exchange programs and links to the Management Talent Exchange Program website where you can find more specific information.
http://icma.org/en/icma/career_network/career_development/talent_exchange 
This is a copy of the Palo Alto, CA Management Talent Exchange program application.
http://www.cityofpaloalto.org/civica/filebank/blobdload.asp?BlobID=7927
I have also included an article and PowerPoint presentation about the talent exchange program in Palo Alto and its successful application elsewhere.
http://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=9&ved=0CGwQFjAI&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.azmanagement.org%2Fdocs%2Fpresos%2F10winter_conf%2Ftalent_strategy%2Fbenest.ppt&ei=9fLcToHKJuLf0QHA0smcCw&usg=AFQjCNHXNjuCW5o4TzurXVD3UrPhqa7B-Q&sig2=dz55obd9LZjcyhx5C3o1_A
http://www.westerncity.com/Western-City/April-2008/Exchange-Program-Supercharges-Career-Opportunities-and-Boosts-Skills/ 
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Tracy Police
text: I am looking for model talent exchange programs and policies.
title: Talent Exchange Programs
